HOME.HERO_TITLE: Altos de la Sierra Country House
HOME.ABOUT_TEXT: Our rural house offers a peaceful setting in the heart of nature. Enjoy an unforgettable stay with stunning views and exceptional comfort.
HOME.SERVICE_2_TEXT: Enjoy fresh products and traditional recipes.
HOME.SERVICE_3_TEXT: Hiking, cycling, and much more in nature.
